Name: Tillakaratne Dilshan
Teams: Sri Lanka, Asia XI, Delhi Capitals, Sussex, Tamil Union Cricket and Athletic Club, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Basnahira Cricket Dundee, Dhaka Gladiators, Ruhuna Reds, Guyana Amazon Warriors, Sydney Thunder, Surrey, Southern Express, Derbyshire, Chittagong Vikings, Karachi Kings, Peshawar Zalmi, City Kaitak, Sri Lanka Legends
Bio: With his relentless aggression,strong wrists  natural timing,Tillakaratne Dilshan is one of the most exciting batsmen in the game today,He is technically sound,much like Virender Sehwag,he uses the defensive option only as a last resort,after all the attacking alternatives have been explored,He loves to make room  thrash the ball through the off side,but the stroke that bears his signature more than any other is the one he developed for the 2009 ICC World Twenty20 - the eponymously named "Dilscoop" shot over his head,which confounded bowlers  experts alike
